page.title: 01Introduction to the area
page.content:
Introduction to the area
The D block is mostly covered with fields.The crop that mostly grows in the fields is corn.In the north west corner of our D block is{Wootton} village which covers approximately one square kilometre.Most of the eastern part of our D block is covered by disused clay pits.At{Kempston {Hardwick}there are brickworks and the seven tall chimneys can be seen for miles around.There are two railway tracks running from the north to the south through our D block.There are two main roads running through our D block from north to south.They are the A421 and the A418.
